Name: 月夜下的紅茶杯 ~ Blacktea With Moon
About the game: Story: I can barely remember the day I crash into Scarlet Devil Mansion. At that time… I was just a vampire hunter. I was…just… so arrogant… When I first came here for my prey…my first prey… How to Play: There are two chapters in this game with no side story or other ending. Players may need more than half hour to finish this game. Other： -This is a Touhou Project fan game. -The game has some levels of changes of the setting from the original game and contains breakdown of characters and Yuri.
